    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_a9c7e6bf80036282c48c83206bc1ed816b9da8e9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Centripetal and centrifugal forces in a whirling conker</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zentripetale und Zentrifugalkräfte in einem 
whirling conker</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces centripètes et centrifuges dans un conker
de tourbillonnement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças centripetal e centrífugas em um conker 
girando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze centripete e centrifughe in un conker 
girantesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεντρομόλες και φυγοκεντρικές δυνάμεις conker</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas centrípetas y centrífugas en un conker 
girante</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that when the hand whirls a conker in a horizontal circle, the conker experiences a centripetal force as the string pulls it and the hand experiences a centrifugal force exerted by the string.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">centripetal force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circular motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conkers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">strings</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß, wenn die Hand ein 
conker in einem horizontalen Kreis whirls, das conker eine 
zentripetale Kraft während die Zeichenkette zieht sie erfährt und 
die Hand erfährt eine Zentrifugalkraft, die durch die Zeichenkette 
angewendet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que quand la main 
tourbillonne un conker en cercle horizontal, le conker éprouve une 
force centripète pendant que la chaîne de caractères la tire et la 
main éprouve une force centrifuge exercée par la chaîne de 
caractères.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que quando a mão 
gira um conker em um círculo horizontal, o conker experimenta uma 
força centripetal enquanto a corda a puxa e a mão experimenta uma 
força centrífuga exercida pela corda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che quando la mano 
gira un conker in un cerchio orizzontale, il conker avverte una forza 
centripeta mentre la stringa la tira e la mano avverte una forza 
centrifuga impiegata dalla stringa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι όταν δοκιμάζουν 
οι περιστροφές χεριών ένα conker σε έναν οριζόντιο κύκλο, το 
conker μια κεντρομόλο δύναμη καθώς η συμβολοσειρά την τραβά 
και το χέρι δοκιμάζει μια φυγοκεντρική δύναμη που ασκείται από 
τη συμβολοσειρά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que cuando la mano 
gira un conker en un círculo horizontal, el conker experimenta una 
fuerza centrípeta mientras que la cadena tira de ella y la mano 
experimenta una fuerza centrífuga ejercida por la cadena.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zentripetale Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kreisförmige Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">conkers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichenketten</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">κεντρομόλος δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">conkers</string>
          </keyword>
